title: Process description is missing in standalone versions
body:
In the internal builds, an `MSBuild.exe` process had a nice icon and a description applied (looks like the description may have just been "MSBuild.exe" but it wasn't blank.

We should have that for the open-source version before we ship it as part of VS.

IIRC @AndyGerlicher was looking at this?

nodes.body: I think this was fixed by #945, right @AndyGerlicher?
